PerfectNetExp.abs: 音乐有对位法（contrapuntal），我们对文化的关怀也要有对位法，也就是尽量用设身处地的立场去想，让东、西方的声音都能出来— …
...亡者至少知道两个；这个多重视野产生一种觉知：觉知同时并存的面向，而这种觉知--借用音乐的术语来说--是对位的（contrapuntal)……流亡是过着习以为常的秩序之外的生活。它是游牧的、去中心的（decen-tered)、对位的；每当.

list.abs: 那么，从“态度和参照结构”的角度“针对性地”(contrapuntally)去读十八、十九世纪突然间兴旺发达的欧洲小说叙述，它们同帝国霸权主 …
协奏曲与管弦乐组曲 (Concertos and Orchestral Suites),BWV 1041 - 1069。 卡农与对位作品 (Canon and contrapuntal works),BWV 1072 - 1087。[9] 台湾教会.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Italian contrapunto (see counterpoint) + -al

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or characteristic of or according to the rules of counterpoint;
2. having two or more independent but harmonically related melodic parts sounding together

auth_sentence.content: I tried to get all the contrapuntal notes right.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I tried to get all the contrapuntal notes right.

auth_sentence.content: Of all his accomplishments, Gershwin was proudest of the thickly contrapuntal orchestral writing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Of all his accomplishments, Gershwin was proudest of the thickly contrapuntal orchestral writing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of all his accomplishments, Gershwin was proudest of the thickly contrapuntal orchestral writing.

auth_sentence.content: These included Rimsky-Korsakov's orchestral virtuosity, Tchaikovsky's lyricism and Taneyev's contrapuntal skill.
auth_sentence.res_content: These included Rimsky-Korsakov's orchestral virtuosity, Tchaikovsky's lyricism and Taneyev's contrapuntal skill.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These included Rimsky-Korsakov's orchestral virtuosity, Tchaikovsky's lyricism and Taneyev's contrapuntal skill.
